item.title: The Real Housewives of New York City' Season 8 Premiere Recap: Bethenny Frankel Insults Jules Wainstein's Size
item.description:
The Real Housewives of New York City' Season 8 Premiere Recap: Bethenny Frankel Insults Jules Wainstein's Size

Welcome (back) to New York! On Wednesday, April 6, the season 8 premiere ofTheReal Housewives of New York Citystarted strong. While there were no explosions to put out just yet, plenty of the ladies were already kindling some flames. Hot topics ranged fromDorinda Medley's still-highly disliked boyfriend John to Sonja Morgan's heavy drinking to newbieJulianne "Jules" Wainstein's weight. Basically, no one was safe.

item.title: Big Brother’s Jordan Lloyd Is Pregnant — and Married to Jeff Schroeder
item.description:
Big Brother’s Jordan Lloyd Is Pregnant — and Married to Jeff Schroeder

Congratulations all around! Reality TV couple extraordinaireJeff SchroederandJordan Lloydexclusively tellUs Weeklythat they quietly married last month, weeks after finding out they are expecting!

item.title: Rob Kardashian Reveals His Weight, Enlists Fiancee Blac Chyna as His Trainer
item.description:
Rob Kardashian Reveals His Weight, Enlists Fiancee Blac Chyna as His Trainer

Day one!Rob Kardashianhas enlisted his fiancée,Blac Chyna, to help him reach his goal weight by her 28th birthday on May 11.

item.title: RIP: Merle Haggard, country music icon, passes away on 79th birthday
item.description:
RIP: Merle Haggard, country music icon, passes away on 79th birthday

SiriusXM is sad report that we’ve learned of the loss of a true icon of country music and close friend ofOutlaw CountryandWillie’s Roadhouse. “The Poet of the Common Man” and member of the Country Music Hall of Fame, Merle Haggard, has passed away on his birthday, at the age of 79. More information is forthcoming.

item.title: Manny Pacquiao's Rags To Riches Story Will Inspire You To Chase Your Dreams
item.description:
Manny Pacquiao's Rags To Riches Story Will Inspire You To Chase Your Dreams

One of the world’s greatest boxers is hanging up the gloves after a long and successful career.

item.title: How Did You Handle the Ending to the Season Finale?
item.description:
How Did You Handle the Ending to the Season Finale?

How did you react to Negan’s punishment? WTF or seriously, WTF? Story Sync asked viewers ofThe Walking Dead Season 6 Finale,“Last Day on Earth,”what they thought about the episode’s ending.
